text: 00:01 Conditional formatting in Excel allows users to visually highlight important values using various formatting options. 01:49 Conditional formatting in Excel allows you to easily visualize data patterns 03:47 Conditional formatting in Excel allows you to use colors, shapes, and indicators to highlight and analyze data. 05:46 Conditional formatting in Excel allows you to highlight cells based on specific rules. 07:42 Conditional Formatting: Highlight Duplicate Values 09:47 Using conditional formatting in Excel to find duplicates in data sets 11:36 Conditional formatting in Excel allows for easier identification of specific data. 13:38 Highlighting cells based on custom formulas in conditional formatting 15:30 Using the dollar sign ($) in Excel allows for hard coding of specific cells. 17:22 Conditional formatting in Excel allows you to highlight specific data based on specific conditions. 19:01 Conditional formatting is a useful and efficient tool for quickly identifying patterns and outliers in large datasets. 20:42 Sponsoring this excel series
